pageContext.claim: “First the Fake News Media said that it’s not fair for the President of the United States to be giving news conferences, but it is the only way I can reach the American People, as seen in the below poll. https://t.co/xP2rqjqtaf”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is cherry-picking a single favorable poll. But ultimately, advisors felt the news conferences were hurting his overall popularity rating and urged him to stop doing them.
